lines.text: Feed the body food and drink, it will survive today. Feed the soul art and music, it will live forever.
[Catherine and Robert have just got on the tractor]
Can't you go faster? I could walk faster!
Okay, then get off!
Merry Christmas Millie.
[Catherine smiles]
Merry Christmas Howard.
[they both smile, and kiss]
If we don't die, I'm gonna kill her.
Your children used to eat this? Didn't they make a fuss?
Why did you give me a ride?
Because I was looking for a nightmarish adventure in the snowy wilderness.
No, why did you?
Because I recognized the look.
What look?
The look that says, "I love my mate more than anything in the world, but if I spend one more minute in here watching him suffer, I'll scream."
Was I that obvious?
Oh good, there's a tractor so there must be a farm up ahead.
How do you know? The farm could have burnt down and all that's left is the tractor
You're a glass half empty kind of fellow, aren't you?
No, I just live in the real world where people don't drive Jaguars in the snow.
